name: CouenneOrbitBranchingObj

algorithms.name:
Orbital Branching for Symmetry Exploitation

Spatial branching object that exploits problem symmetry via
orbital branching to prune symmetric subtrees.

**Orbital branching:**
When symmetry is detected (via nauty), branching on one variable
in an orbit implicitly covers all symmetric variables in that orbit.
This avoids exploring symmetric portions of the search tree.

**Key features:**
- boundBranch(): Returns true if only bound changes (no cuts)
- simulate_: Flag for simulating branch without execution
- Integrates with CouenneNauty symmetry detection

**Branch execution:**
branch() applies bound changes and optionally generates
convexification cuts, with symmetry-aware pruning.

see: CouenneOrbitObj which creates these branching objects
